INSTRUCTIONS:

First you have to choose game mode: 

Mode0: one bar and bricks on the top

Mode1: two bars and bricks at the middle of the screen

Enter selected number 0 or 1 and press RETURN key. If you put incorrect number the

 game will not run correctly.

This is a simple PONG game, with some bricks on the screen. if the ball touch the sides of  the bricks they will explode, may ruin the walls also. If the ball touch the "o"-s at the corners, the result is bigger booms.

Enjoy the game!

Recommended emulator:  YAPE

CONTROLS:

 , - left move

 . - right move

at the end: Y key pressed restarts the game others will exit.

CODE DESCRIPTIONS:

0: Set game mode, and put upper "o"-s 

1: Build the walls and the lower "o"-s 

2: Display the bricks

3: Set the bar(s)

4-5: move the bars 

6: move the ball

7-8: Collision detection

9: Bar hit the ball, and final controls
